pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a dramatic sunset over a lush, green field. The clouds sweep quickly across the sky as the sun sets on the horizon, causing the entire scene to darken. The beautiful, cloudy sky is reflected in the still water in the foreground.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
original_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a dramatic sunset over a lush, green field. The clouds sweep quickly across the sky as the sun sets on the horizon, causing the entire scene to darken. The beautiful, cloudy sky is reflected in the still water in the foreground.
initial_feedback: The clouds sweep slowly across the sky
gpt_feedback: The clouds appear to move slowly across the sky.
final_feedback: The clouds appear to move slowly across the sky.
gpt_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a dramatic sunset over a lush, green field. The clouds drift slowly across the sky as the sun sets on the horizon, causing the entire scene to darken. The beautiful, cloudy sky is reflected in the still water in the foreground.
